programme.title: Wind River
programme.desc: Cory Lambert is a wildlife officer who finds the body of a teenager on an American Indian reservation in snowy Wyoming. Teaming up with an FBI agent, the duo soon find that their lives are in danger while trying to solve the mystery of her death.

programme.title: The Kid
programme.desc: On the run in the American Southwest, a boy encounters the infamous outlaw Billy the Kid and the legendary lawman Pat Garrett. He soon finds himself caught in the crossfire as Billy and Garrett square off in a deadly game of cat and mouse.

programme.title: The Homesman
programme.desc: A frontier farm woman (Hilary Swank) saves the life of a claim-jumper (Tommy Lee Jones) and persuades him to help her escort three insane women to a safe haven in Iowa.

programme.title: Partners of the Trail
programme.desc: Two lawmen uncover a plot to steal a gold claim when they ride into town to investigate several killings.

programme.title: Land of the Outlaws
programme.desc: A cowboy (Johnny Mack Brown) and his partner (Raymond Hatton) ride where the lawless try to hide.

programme.title: 'Neath the Arizona Skies
programme.desc: A cowboy escorts a young half-Native American girl, whose mother has recently died. He must find her white father in order to claim her hefty inheritance.

programme.title: Blue Steel
programme.desc: Marshal John Carruthers helps a sheriff find out who stole the town's payroll, and together they discover the town's leader stole the money to buy up all the land.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Little Joe and Hoss are mistaken for gunmen while in a small Texas town; they find themselves in the middle of a dangerous feud between two families.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: A potential mayoral candidate attempts to stir up trouble between majority and minority groups in town.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: A former dance hall girl poses as a Spanish heiress to claim a land grant that includes part of the Ponderosa; guest Sebastian Cabot.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: A shepherd ignores the Cartwrights' warning not to drive his flock across the Ponderosa; guest Everett Sloane.

programme.title: 26 Men
programme.desc: When the daughter of the commander of an army post is kidnapped, Rynning, Travis and two undercover Army officers are sent to find her and set her free.

programme.title: 26 Men
programme.desc: Captain Rynning and several of his Rangers join a posse to smoke out the remnants of Luke Baxter's gang. The outlaws momentarily give the posse the slip and double back.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Infamous outlaw Augustine Chacon murders two Texas Rangers, prompting Matt and Margaret to travel south of the border to bring him to justice.

programme.title: Adventures of Red Ryder
programme.sub-title: Murder on the Santa Fe Trail
programme.desc: Mesquite banker Calvin Drake plans to profit from Santa Fe Railroad by gaining control of all the land in the territory.

programme.title: Adventures of Red Ryder
programme.desc: Red carries Beth to shore after the stagecoach hits the water; Red and Beth capture Shark and bring him to the Mesquite jail.

programme.title: Adventures of Red Ryder
programme.desc: Cherokee saves Red from certain death; Drake convinces the ranchers that the raids are over.

programme.title: Adventures of Red Ryder
programme.desc: Red derails a mining car before it can crush him; the henchmen escape with the rancher's money.

programme.title: Adventures of Red Ryder
programme.desc: Red escapes from the water tank hazard and orders the cowhands to start moving the cattle to the Lazy-W Ranch; Hanlon learns of this plan and prepares to stop them.

programme.title: Adventures of Red Ryder
programme.desc: Red, carrying Beth, reaches the safety of an overhanging ledge; Red moves the herd to the BAR-M Ranch; to raise money, Red organizes a Wells-Fargo stagecoach race.

programme.title: Adventures of Red Ryder
programme.desc: Red frees himself from the noose and barely beats the outlaw's stagecoach across the finish line, winning the $5000 prize.

programme.title: Adventures of Red Ryder
programme.desc: Red secures a confession from Grimes; Dade is trapped by Red and Cherokee in the act of destroying evidence.

programme.title: Adventures of Red Ryder
programme.desc: Red and Cherokee escape from the burning jail; Red learns that the Ryder ranch is about to be foreclosed by Drake's agents.

programme.title: Adventures of Red Ryder
programme.desc: Red barely escapes from the blast; in the aftermath of the explosion, he discovers papers linking Ace Hanlon to the raids on the ranchers.

programme.title: Adventures of Red Ryder
programme.desc: A rancher organizes an opposition to a crooked banker.

programme.title: Adventures of Red Ryder
programme.desc: Sheriff Lawson wires for a Federal Land Commissioner to check on the various titles to land in the Mesquite district; One-Eye, under orders from Drake, attempts to halt the stagecoach and kill Treadway, the land agent.

programme.title: Adventures of Red Ryder
programme.sub-title: Murder on the Santa Fe Trail
programme.desc: Mesquite banker Calvin Drake plans to profit from Santa Fe Railroad by gaining control of all the land in the territory.

programme.title: West of the Rio Grande
programme.desc: Two-fisted cowboys fight for law and order in their encounters with outlaws.

programme.title: The Lonesome Trail
programme.desc: The greedy owners of a ghost town create rumors of a gold rush in order to stir up business.

programme.title: The Lawless Frontier
programme.desc: A cowboy (John Wayne) protects a girl (Sheila Terry) and her father (George Hayes) from a rustler and a sheriff.

programme.title: The Lucky Texan
programme.desc: Jerry Mason (John Wayne) and his friend Jake (George Hayes) have to keep two crooks away from their gold.

programme.title: McLintock!
programme.desc: A cattle baron (John Wayne) tries to tame his wife (Maureen O'Hara) amid a feud with settlers and trouble with Indians.
